body.name: Bluetooth Speakers,Portable Wireless Outdoor Speaker with HD Soun, IPX7 Waterproof Shower Speaker, TWS, Enhanced Bass, 6H Playtime,Built in Mic for Sports, Pool, Beach, Hiking, Camping (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 🎶100% WATERPROOF - portable bluetooth speaker can totally resist water spray and splash. The water vapor in bathroom will never interfere with the sound quality of the speaker, feel free to be a bathroom rocker. (DO NOT immerse it into water).

🎶LOUND HD SOUND & POWERFUL BATTERY - Support A2DP and built with a 5W speaker. It can streams incredible stereo sound with full range output, crystal clear sound. Supported up to 6 hours playing time at the volume to 70% of the maximum volume.

🎶EASY TO CARRY & SUPER SUCTION - Equipped with detachable suction and aluminum alloy metal hook, it is easy to attach in bathroom tiles and mirrors with suction cup, and you can also use the metal hook to hang the portable speaker on the backpack.

🎶COMPATIBLE WITH ALL BLUETOOTH DEVICE – shower speaker supported to connect with all iOS Android devices, phone, computers and even Echo series. ( Audio cable and charging cable included in the package.
🎶EFFORTLESS CONNECTIVITY - Bluetooth 4.2 ensures instant pairing and maintains a strong connection up to 33 ft. Bluetooth speaker promise to provide you with a smooth and consistent music experience.
body.description: Why You Choose Our Bluetooth Speakers?--IPX5 waterproof,Rain Proof,Splash Proof,Shockproof,Dustproof--latest Bluetooth technology, compatible with most Bluetooth devices, included Iphone, Ipad, Macbook,Samsung etc and also compatible with echo dot series.--Built-in Mic ,Release your Hand for Personal Speakerphone.Multiple Connection Way!--The wireless bluetooth speaker support most bluetooth device and non-bluetooth device such as Micro SD/TF card,3.5mm AUX Line.You can enjoy music with bluetooth device or traditional non-bluetooth device.Superior Sound Quality!--Having high quality loudspeakers and excellent bass. Just enjoy the music from a deceivingly small package.Perfect Size with High Capacity Battery!--The size of the speaker is Ultra Portable, Ultra Lightweight.You can enjoy high quality music outdoors easitly, such as beach,BBQ,Pool,Camping.--The waterproof bluetooth speaker has high capacity battery. It can play about 5 hours of continuous use.Product Details：Battery: 800 MAHPower: 4R 3WVoltage: DC 5VPlay Time: 4-6 hoursCharging time: 2-3 hoursSize: 71mm * 45mmPackage includes:1 x Bluetooth Speaker1 x Charging Cable1x 3.5mm AUX Audio Line1 x Metal Carabiner1 x User Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've had this for a couple months or so now, and I enjoy using it. great sound quality and easy to use. highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this easy to pair to bluetooth sound is very clear and water resistant I know I drop my in the bath tub put still works great item

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT WASTE YOUR $$$$
reviews.reviewText: It’s cheap yes as for 💲 ….it sound like you are holding it underwater, last about 20-30 minutes then drops connection w phone 2ft away, then after you try to charge it all you hear is rhythmic static. If you’re lucky you will get a lyric or two and then nothing.My kid is autistic and LOVES music. The last cheap little speaker we had was AMAZING but was left at the beach accidentally. Thought with the reviews I had glanced over it would be ok. NOPE. And we cannot return it because my son ripped up and destroyed the boxes and it’s too much of a hassle.Don’t be dumb like I was. Save your dollars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Grandboys love it when taking a shower

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Worse $10 I’ve Spent
reviews.reviewText: Nothing good about this purchase! I’ve never had to make a bad review but this is the first. The item is maybe 3”x1 1/2” so I wasn’t expecting much but it was worse than I could imagine. Billed to have 6 hour playtime but I’ve got 2 hours before it beeps and turns off! Not sure what TWS means but I’m going with “tinny whinny sound”! You couldn’t have worse speaker quality if you got a 1950’s AM radio and put it in a sealed bucket. The Bluetooth connection is also suspect. It has trouble within a foot sometimes and if you go through an open door 10 foot away it completely drops out. Save your $10.50 and buy ANYTHING else!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Crackles and sounds like a lot of blurred noise
reviews.reviewText: It sounds like drunk and it's not loud it's horrible and then it doesn't want to plug in now it's made so cheaply don't buy it guys

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Upon delivery, I used the speaker before officially charging it. Which was about 2 hours or so of playtime. However, when I went to plug it in I notice the port wasnt properly alighned. I proceeded anyway and the red light came on however, when I left the device to check if it was finished I noticed it wasnt charging and the light was gone and the port now had a slight crack.Its not keeping charge nor is it charging properly.It was a cheap purchase, so I got what I paid for. The cost to return the item is more than what I purchased it for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Nice to do the job
reviews.reviewText: But, doesn't last. Heard a loud noise coming from it after listening on it. Wasn't sure what was that about? Haven't used it after that. Will check it to see if it still works. And will post an update.
